dct_title_s: Karte eines Theiles von Hoch-Armenien : nach eigenen Recognoscirungen und eingezogenen Erkundigungen zusammengestellt von W. Strecker, Obrist in K. Türkischen Diensten = Map of a part of Upper Armenia : assembled from personal reconnaissance and inquiries by W. Strecker, colonel in the Royal Turkish Services / C. Ohmann, lith
dct_description_sm: Includes continuation of main map eastward from Erzurum. Includes inset map: Strasse von Trapezunt bis Gömüschchane nach C. Sax, showing winter and summer routes between Trabzon and Gümüşhane. Includes diagram, "Felsengrotten zu Pekkeridj," showing layout, dimensions, and inscriptions of grottoes at Pekeriç. Relief shown by hachures and spot heights in feet. Includes glossary with German translation and phonetics of Turkish and Kurdish terms. Route of cartographer and route of Xenophon according to cartographer are shown. Tafel VIII. Printed by F. Barth. From: Zeitschrift der Gesellschaft für Erdkunde zu Berlin, Bd. 4 (1869), pp. 145-62; held at ReCAP. Call number: 910.6 B451.
